unnormalised: Pesticide usage in agriculture, especially in areas like Punjab, requires careful consideration. The Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) has guidelines. Over-reliance, like in the film "Mother India", can lead to soil degradation. Integrated Pest Management (IPM) strategies are crucial. Proper training for farmers in villages like Rampur is vital. We must prioritize sustainable practices to protect our land for future generations. This involves responsible use and exploring bio-pesticides. Consider soil health, studied at CSK Himachal Pradesh Agricultural University.
